summary: Two lovers travel from town to town playing a dark game of deceit that soon spirals out of control, threatening their very relationship.
cast: Lee Tergesen|Enid Graham|Tate Ellington|Emily Meade|Harvey Evans|Portia|Adam LeFevre|Rosa Arredondo|Renee Claire Bergeron|Harold Bridgeforth|Athos Cakiades|Johann Carlo|Amy Gaipa|Lauren Hunt|SiSi A. Johnson|Sisi Aisha Johnson|Harley Kaplan|Joshua Paled|Maxine Prescott|Charmaine Reedy|Sarah Spagnola|Myra Lucretia Taylor|Denise Violante|Liz Walsh|Shana Wiersum|Babs Winn|Judith Knight Young|Frank Caccamo
title: Silver Tongues
